channel.title: Green on Pavel Konoplenko Home
channel.description: Recent content in Green on Pavel Konoplenko Home

item.title: Rivers moving
item.description:
To watch a raindrow fall down a windschield…

…is to see the river slither across the landscape.

item.title: Following obsessions
item.description:
Knowing when is enough is the secret. There’s different levels of obsessions, all concurrently pulling and influences us.

We find ourselves in the middle.
